casebody.data:
FELTON
v.
BUTLER, et al. 161P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017

Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. David Felton, For Felton, David, For the State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2017 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
